casebody.data:
In the Matter of R.P.D. No. 370P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Ryan McKaig, for Davis, Racine. Kathleen Arundell Jackson, for Mecklenburg County. Matthew D. Wunsche, Appellate Counsel, for GAL. Matthew Wunsche, Durham.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of November 2015 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
